reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Community Charter; Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District Act; Greater Vancouver Water District Act; Islands Trust Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Conflict of Interest Exceptions Regulation

bcl:definition.bcl:text: council representative means a member of a municipal council appointed by that council to the board of an entity;
entity means any of the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a corporation, other than a society or extraprovincial society, incorporated by a public authority, that provides a service to the following:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a municipality of which a council member is appointed to the board of the corporation;
a regional district of which a regional district director is appointed to the board of the corporation;
a greater board of which a board member is appointed to the board of the corporation;
the Islands Trust of which an Islands Trust trustee is appointed to the board of the corporation;

bcl:definition.bcl:text: extraprovincial society has the same meaning as in the Society Act;
governing body means any of the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the board of a regional district;
the board of a greater board;

bcl:definition.bcl:text: greater board representative means a member of a board of a greater board appointed by that board to the board of an entity;
Islands Trust representative means an Islands Trust trustee appointed by the trust council to the board of an entity;
Islands Trust trustee means a local trustee or a municipal trustee within the meaning of the Islands Trust Act;
regional district director means a director in relation to a regional district within the meaning of the Local Government Act;
regional district representative means a regional district director appointed by the board of a regional district to the board of an entity;
representative means any of the following:
society has the same meaning as in the Society Act;
specified interest means any of the following:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: an expenditure of public funds to or on behalf of an entity;
an advantage, benefit, grant or other form of assistance to or on behalf of an entity;
an acquisition or disposition of an interest or right in real or personal property that results in an advantage, benefit or disadvantage to or on behalf of an entity;
an agreement respecting a matter described in paragraph (a), (b) or (c).

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 104 (1) (e) [exceptions from conflict restrictions] of the Act, a pecuniary interest in relation to a representative in the nature of a specified interest that arises as a result of

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the representative being appointed by a governing body to the board of the entity, and

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: attending any part of a meeting during which the specified interest is under consideration by the following:

bcl:clause.bcl:text: a committee of the governing body;
any other body referred to in section 93Â [application of rules to other bodies] of the Act,

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: participating in any discussion of the specified interest at such a meeting, or
voting on a question in respect of the specified interest at such a meeting

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Community Charter, S.B.C. 2003, c. 26, section 104 (1) (e); Greater Vancouver Sewerage and Drainage District Act, S.B.C. 1956, c. 59, section 8 (5); Greater Vancouver Water District Act, S.B.C. 1924, c. 22, section 10 (5); Islands Trust Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 239, section 6 (7)]
